[CSSClassOrClassFn](./fragmenter.cssclassorclassfn.md)

_(Optional)_ The CSS class to add to each new element. It can be a simple class name (string) or a function. If it's a function, it receives the segment's index and text content as arguments, and should return a class name or `undefined` to not add any class.


</td></tr>
